name: PeekABoo (itch) (cindyjesslynlee)
description:
What you see on the screen is not the real world. 

Use "Reveal Mode" to reveal the fake world to uncover where the key, traps, and items are. Switch into "Play Mode" to move your player. You can use stickers to freely place markers within the level during "Reveal Mode".

Assets by Kenney
